title: Top/Jungler Looking for team
body:
Tired of playing with random teams with no strategy. Looking for any team for ranks.

Add me in game - CalZe

replies.body:
You are not looking for a team.. you are looking for a new game.. you will find non of what you seek here. Strategy is MID ONLY. Strategy is BLAME OTHERS. Strategy is get the least CS on your team and call them all trollers and feeders.

%100 supported and endorsed by RIOT
